name: 15 Puzzle Sliding Number Game
description:
Bored? Need to kill time? This classic game is for you!

* Easy, relaxing game to stimulate your mind
* Shuffle the numbers and solve the puzzle. Always a different puzzle!

How to play: Tap the big button to shuffle the numbers and start playing the game!

Features:
- Simple game, great for killing time.
- Random puzzle with every game. Infinite possibilities.
- Move multiple tiles at once to save time!
- Animated tile movements gives a more natural feel
- Statistics keeps track of best, average and total scores
- Fits all iDevices (including retina versions).
